title: Rain
description: After losing almost everything he’s ever cared about, sixteen year old, Tyler Grey inadvertently gains something that he never could have imagined before.  A MASSIVE amount of ancient power!  Forced into a war as old as the earth itself, he’ll have to quickly adapt to his new abilities if he hopes to evade his deadly pursuers.  Not to mention, this is his freshman year in high-school.  (THE FIRST INSTALLMENT IN THE “RAIN” TRILOGY!)
author: Christopher L.P.
